scripts.swa:all: swa start http://localhost:3000 --api-location api --run "npm run dev"
scripts.swa:build: npm run build && cd api && npm run build
scripts.dev:with-api: npm run build:api && swa start http://localhost:3000 --api-location api --run "npm run dev"
scripts.azurite:test: npm run azurite:start & sleep 3 && npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json test/azurite/test-table-storage.ts && pkill -f azurite
scripts.azurite:simple-test: npm run azurite:start & sleep 3 && node test/azurite/simple-test.js && pkill -f azurite
scripts.azurite:zod-test: npm run azurite:start & sleep 3 && node test/azurite/zod-validation-test.js && pkill -f azurite
scripts.demo:storage-explorer: npm run azurite:start & sleep 3 && npm run create-dummy-data
scripts.pre-commit: npm run check:gitignore && npm run lint
